name: Jamboni
description:
A 4 player Zamboni game about cleaning the most ice.

Plays using 4 controllers:

- the left analogue stick points your zamboni

-the y axis on the right analogue stick controls your forward thrust

Players try and clean the most ice. Doing so leaves behind a colored trail.

The player who reaches 100% wins the round.

First player to win 3 rounds wins the game.

There are two "power ups" that drop randomly during the round.

The green power up cleans more ice around you and leaves your colour

The red power up clears away and cleaned up around you, removing all color and subtracting points.
